description: For infused medications, the length of time the infusion process, as a duration.  Note the difference between infuseOver and duration of treatment (specified in administrationFrequency). An order may call for infusing a patient TID for an hour each time over a duration of 5 days.

element.definition: For infused medications, the length of time the infusion process, as a duration.  Note the difference between infuseOver and duration of treatment (specified in administrationFrequency). An order may call for infusing a patient TID for an hour each time over a duration of 5 days.

name: The length of the infusion

element.definition: For infused medications, the length of time the infusion process, as a duration.  Note the difference between infuseOver and duration of treatment (specified in administrationFrequency). An order may call for infusing a patient TID for an hour each time over a duration of 5 days.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

element.comments: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition should be version specific.  This will ideally be the URI for the Resource Profile defining the extension, with the code for the extension after a #.
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension

element.comments: The context of use may frequently define what kind of quantity this is and therefore what kind of units can be used. The context of use may also restrict the values for the comparator.

constraint.human: If a code for the unit is present, the system SHALL also be present
There SHALL be a code if there is a value and it SHALL be an expression of time.  If system is present, it SHALL be UCUM.

element.definition: There SHALL be a code if there is a value and it SHALL be an expression of time.  If system is present, it SHALL be UCUM.

mapping.map: PQ, IVL<PQ>, MO, CO, depending on the values
